main event: An object, described as the size of a basketball, flickered, stood still, sped up suddenly, rushed away, exploded, and emitted smoke.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes,The object was reported to be stationary before it rushed away,The report states multiple possible explanations for the sighting including aircraft and astronomical phenomena,The color of the object was not specified,The description of the object's behavior was deemed outside the norm.
sighted object: an object the size of a basketball
